name: Beedeedee
tagline: A multithreaded library for binary decision diagrams
body:
BeeDeeDee is a Java BDD library that allows concurrent manipulation of
Binary Decision Diagrams, by exploiting multithreading.

Binary Decision Diagrams (BDDs) are efficient representations of Boolean formulas.
Once a variable ordering is defined, these representations are canonical.
That is, two equivalent
formulas are represented by the same diagram, and
equivalence tests run in constant time.
Moreover, efficient algorithms exist for common Boolean operations.
By using a BDD library to manipulate Boolean functions, your application
will be able to manage big logical formulas easily.
